actions.name: AssociateDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to connect a directory to be used by AWS Single Sign-On

actions.name: AssociateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create an association between a directory user or group and a profile

actions.name: AttachManagedPolicyToPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to attach an AWS managed policy to a permission set

actions.name: CreateAccountAssignment
actions.description: Grants permission to assign access to a Principal for a specified AWS account using a specified permission set

actions.name: CreateApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to add an application instance to AWS Single Sign-On

actions.name: CreateApplicationInstanceCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to add a new certificate for an application instance

actions.name: CreateInstanceAccessControlAttributeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to enable the instance for ABAC and specify the attributes

actions.name: CreateManagedApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to add a managed application instance to AWS Single Sign-On

actions.name: CreatePermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to create a permission set

actions.name: CreateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to create a profile for an application instance

actions.name: CreateTrust
actions.description: Grants permission to create a federation trust in a target account

actions.name: DeleteAccountAssignment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Principal's access from a specified AWS account using a specified permission set

actions.name: DeleteApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the application instance

actions.name: DeleteApplicationInstanceCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an inactive or expired certificate from the application instance

actions.name: DeleteInlinePolicyFromPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the inline policy from a specified permission set

actions.name: DeleteInstanceAccessControlAttributeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to disable ABAC and remove the attributes list for the instance

actions.name: DeleteManagedApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the managed application instance

actions.name: DeletePermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a permission set

actions.name: DeletePermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the permission policy associated with a permission set

actions.name: DeleteProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the profile for an application instance

actions.name: DescribeAccountAssignmentCreationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the status of the assignment creation request

actions.name: DescribeAccountAssignmentDeletionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the status of an assignment deletion request

actions.name: DescribeInstanceAccessControlAttributeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to get the list of attributes used by the instance for ABAC

actions.name: DescribePermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a permission set

actions.name: DescribePermissionSetProvisioningStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the status for the given Permission Set Provisioning request

actions.name: DescribePermissionsPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all the permissions policies associated with a permission set

actions.name: DescribeRegisteredRegions
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain the regions where your organization has enabled AWS Single Sign-on

actions.name: DetachManagedPolicyFromPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to detach the attached AWS managed policy from the specified permission set

actions.name: DisassociateDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a directory to be used by AWS Single Sign-On

actions.name: DisassociateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a directory user or group from a profile

actions.name: GetApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details for an application instance

actions.name: GetApplicationTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve application template details

actions.name: GetInlinePolicyForPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to obtain the inline policy assigned to the permission set

actions.name: GetManagedApplicationInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details for an application instance

actions.name: GetMfaDeviceManagementForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve Mfa Device Management settings for the directory

actions.name: GetPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a permission set

actions.name: GetPermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all permission policies associated with a permission set

actions.name: GetProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a profile for an application instance

actions.name: GetSSOStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to check if AWS Single Sign-On is enabled

actions.name: GetSharedSsoConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve shared configuration for the current SSO instance

actions.name: GetSsoConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve configuration for the current SSO instance

actions.name: GetTrust
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the federation trust in a target account

actions.name: ImportApplicationInstanceServiceProviderMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to update the application instance by uploading an application SAML metadata file provided by the service provider

actions.name: ListAccountAssignmentCreationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to list the status of the AWS account assignment creation requests for a specified SSO instance

actions.name: ListAccountAssignmentDeletionStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to list the status of the AWS account assignment deletion requests for a specified SSO instance

actions.name: ListAccountAssignments
actions.description: Grants permission to list the assignee of the specified AWS account with the specified permission set

actions.name: ListAccountsForProvisionedPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the AWS accounts where the specified permission set is provisioned

actions.name: ListApplicationInstanceCertificates
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all of the certificates for a given application instance

actions.name: ListApplicationInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all application instances

actions.name: ListApplicationTemplates
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all supported application templates

actions.name: ListApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all supported applications

actions.name: ListDirectoryAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve details about the directory connected to AWS Single Sign-On

actions.name: ListInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to list the SSO Instances that the caller has access to

actions.name: ListManagedPoliciesInPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to list the AWS managed policies that are attached to a specified permission set

actions.name: ListPermissionSetProvisioningStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to list the status of the Permission Set Provisioning requests for a specified SSO instance

actions.name: ListPermissionSets
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all permission sets

actions.name: ListPermissionSetsProvisionedToAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the permission sets that are provisioned to a specified AWS account

actions.name: ListProfileAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the directory user or group associated with the profile

actions.name: ListProfiles
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all profiles for an application instance

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are attached to a specified resource

actions.name: ProvisionPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to provision a specified permission set to the specified target

actions.name: PutInlinePolicyToPermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to attach an IAM inline policy to a permission set

actions.name: PutMfaDeviceManagementForDirectory
actions.description: Grants permission to put Mfa Device Management settings for the directory

actions.name: PutPermissionsPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to add a policy to a permission set

actions.name: SearchGroups
actions.description: Grants permission to search for groups within the associated directory

actions.name: SearchUsers
actions.description: Grants permission to search for users within the associated directory

actions.name: StartSSO
actions.description: Grants permission to initialize AWS Single Sign-On

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a set of tags with a specified resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate a set of tags from a specified resource

actions.name: UpdateApplicationInstanceActiveCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to set a certificate as the active one for this application instance

actions.name: UpdateApplicationInstanceDisplayData
actions.description: Grants permission to update display data of an application instance

actions.name: UpdateApplicationInstanceResponseConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update federation response configuration for the application instance

actions.name: UpdateApplicationInstanceResponseSchemaConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update federation response schema configuration for the application instance

actions.name: UpdateApplicationInstanceSecurityConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update security details for the application instance

actions.name: UpdateApplicationInstanceServiceProviderConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update service provider related configuration for the application instance

actions.name: UpdateApplicationInstanceStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update the status of an application instance

actions.name: UpdateDirectoryAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to update the user attribute mappings for your connected directory

actions.name: UpdateInstanceAccessControlAttributeConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the attributes to use with the instance for ABAC

actions.name: UpdateManagedApplicationInstanceStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to update the status of a managed application instance

actions.name: UpdatePermissionSet
actions.description: Grants permission to update the permission set

actions.name: UpdateProfile
actions.description: Grants permission to update the profile for an application instance

actions.name: UpdateSSOConfiguration
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration for the current SSO instance

actions.name: UpdateTrust
actions.description: Grants permission to update the federation trust in a target account
